description: Even though it is a really good application the fact that it is a Mono based application makes Gaupol a much better choice for most people me included.
My absolute favorite subtitle editor. This deserves at update. The program is a complete joy to use, and very intuitive.

This application is unusable. When I try to adjust the start, end, or duration timers for a line, sometimes randomly the focus will jump to a completely random line and apply the change to that instead. Because of this, it's impossible to actually adjust when and for how long a subtitle appears for.

Was looking for a subtitle editor to do shift all subtitles.
was very easy and comfortable using.
Been a longtime user, it is easy to use, but I think there is a bug in this app that makes it take gigs and gigs of memory sometimes, causing you to kill it :(
